mapper.insert: insert into topic (title, content, topic_tag_id, topic_type, topic_user_id, topic_time, topic_picture) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{topicTagId}, #{topicType}, #{topicUserId}, #{topicTime}, #{topicPicture})
